      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="de">Vorstellungen von "den Wilden": die Völkerschau</string>
            <string language="en">Perception of the "savage tribes": the ethnological exhibition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perception "des tribus sauvages" : 
l'exposition ethnologique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Percepção "dos tribes selvagens": o 
exhibition ethnological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percezione "delle tribù selvagge": la 
mostra ethnological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίληψη για τις "άγριες φυλέσ": η εθνολογική 
έκθεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Opinión de las "tribus salvajes": la 
exposición etnológica</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Weiterführende Fragen zum Thema "das Fremde": Ein Plakat einer Völkerschau um 1930 und ein Zeitungsbericht von 2001 stehen zur Verfügung.</string>
            <string language="en">Further questions on "the alien": A poster of an ethnological exposition from around 1930 and a newspaper report from 2001 are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Afrika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Fremder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Völkerschau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Sensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Strangers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">People voelkerschau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'autres questions sur "l'étranger" : Une 
affiche d'une exposition ethnologique environ de 1930 et un état de 
journal de 2001 sont fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perguntas mais adicionais "no estrangeiro": 
Um poster de uma exposição ethnological de ao redor 1930 e um 
relatório do jornal de 2001 são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ulteriori domande "sullo straniero": Un 
manifesto di un'esposizione ethnological da intorno 1930 e un rapporto
del giornale da 2001 sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περαιτέρω ερωτήσεις "στον αλλοδαπό": Μια αφίσα 
μιας εθνολογικής έκθεσης από περίπου το 1930 και μια έκθεση 
εφημερίδων από το 2001 παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Otras preguntas sobre "el extranjero": Un 
cartel de una exposición etnológica a partir de alrededor 1930 y un 
informe del periódico a partir del 2001 se proporcionan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Afrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étrangers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
